trans-unit.source: Provides a file system implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebResponse" /> 類別的檔案系統實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> class implements the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>`abstract` base class to return file system resources for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>類別會實作<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>`abstract`基底類別，以傳回檔案的系統資源<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>類別。

trans-unit.source: Client applications do not create <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> instances directly; instead, they are created by calling the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method on a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應用程式不會建立<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>執行個體直接; 相反地，它們會建立藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance that provides read-only access to a file system resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.IO.Stream>提供唯讀存取檔案系統資源的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> class relies on the <xref:System.IO.File> class for error handling and code access security.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>類別會倚賴<xref:System.IO.File>錯誤處理和程式碼存取安全性的類別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance that contains the information required to serialize the new <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 執行個體，其中包含要序列化新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> 執行個體的必要資訊。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> class that contains the source of the serialized stream associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 類別的執行個體，其包含與新 <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> 執行個體相關聯的序列化資料流來源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> class from the specified instances of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 類別的已指定執行個體，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式實作<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>介面<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: Closes the response stream.
trans-unit.target: 關閉回應資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A> method cleans up the resources used by a <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> and closes the response stream by calling the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>方法清除所使用的資源<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>並關閉回應資料流，藉由呼叫<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免系統資源不足，必須先關閉回應資料流。

trans-unit.source: You can closes the response stream by calling either <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫關閉回應資料流<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或 <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A> method to close the response stream.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>方法，關閉回應資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the content in the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得檔案系統資源內容的長度。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes returned from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳回自檔案系統資源的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> property contains the length, in bytes, of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A>屬性包含檔案系統資源的長度，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> property to obtain the content length of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A>屬性，以取得檔案系統資源的內容長度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得檔案系統資源的內容類型。

trans-unit.source: The value "binary/octet-stream".
trans-unit.target: 「二進位/八進位資料流」值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> property contains the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>屬性包含檔案系統資源的內容類型。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> is always "binary/octet-stream".
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>一律為 「 二進位/八位元資料流 」。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> property to obtain the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>屬性，以取得檔案系統資源的內容類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要以資料填入的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，指定這個序列化的目的地。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 將序列化目標物件所需的資料填入 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的任何物件<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>自動追蹤和序列化格式子。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 從檔案系統資源傳回資料流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for reading data from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，用於從檔案系統資源讀取資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method returns the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>方法會從檔案系統資源傳回的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免系統資源不足，必須先關閉回應資料流。

trans-unit.source: The response stream can be closed by calling <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>
trans-unit.target: 可以藉由呼叫關閉回應資料流<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或 <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method to return the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>方法來傳回資料流的檔案系統資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: 取得與回應相關聯標頭名稱/值組的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> that contains the header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" />，包含與回應相關聯的標頭名稱/值組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers%2A> property contains two name/value pairs, one for content length and one for content type, both of which are also exposed as properties, <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers%2A>屬性包含兩個名稱/值組，一個用於內容長度，一個用於內容的類型，這兩種也會公開為屬性，<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A>和<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers%2A> property to retrieve the name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers%2A>屬性，以擷取與回應相關聯的名稱/值組。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供回應的檔案系統資源 URI。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，包含提供回應的檔案系統資源 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ResponseUri%2A> property contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ResponseUri%2A>屬性包含提供回應的檔案系統資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: This is always the file system resource that was requested.
trans-unit.target: 這一定是所要求的檔案系統資源。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ResponseUri%2A> to retrieve the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ResponseUri%2A>擷取提供回應的檔案系統資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers" /> property is supported by the <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="P:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers" /> 執行個體是否支援 <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="P:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers" /> property is supported by the <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> instance; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers" /> 執行個體支援 <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> 屬性，則為 true；否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: This property is always true for [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性一定是 true。 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> , which will hold the serialized data for the <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，將保留 <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> 的序列化資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> containing the destination of the serialized stream associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，含有與新 <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> 相關聯序列化資料流的目的端。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance with the data needed to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" />.
trans-unit.target: 以序列化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 所需的資料填入 <see cref="T:System.Net.FileWebResponse" /> 執行個體。
